required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Interactions Between Hydronidone and Entecavir Capsules in Healthy Chinese Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Pharmacokinetic Interactions Between Hydronidone and Entecavir Capsules in Healthy Chinese Subjects(Single Center, Single Arm, Open, Self - Control)

brief_summary.textblock: This study, by comparing the Hydronidone capsules and entecavir capsule in a single dose and steady-state dosing state of both the level of blood drug concentration, assess Hydronidone capsules and entecavir capsule for interaction。

primary_outcome.description: Compare the difference in plasma drug concentration between single drug and two drug combinations

intervention.description: take the Hydronidone capsule and then the entecavir capsule, and then take the last two together

facility.name: Ethics committee of drug clinical trials of huazhong university of science and technology
